title: What are characters or places in time for a book that I am writing? - Quora

response.answer_text: i have a problem with bit players in the stories I write. If the person is in mentioned in, let’s say, three paragraphs, I feel that person needs a name. But the main characters might interact with several bit players and inventing all those names is annoying. I love Fantasy name generators. Names for all your fantasy characters. In the ‘real names’ category, it will offer English, Korean, Chinese, Tibetan, and many other groups of names. Some other generators (this is from a blog post of mine so the formatting is different from Quoran links): A human name generator. Superhero character generator. Lists of names with meanings. D & D characters. Character appearance generator. Character backstory.A google app: Character story planner. I wasn’t going to offer a link to my blog because I don’t want people to feel they have to visit it for details to my answers here. But I can’t tell if I copied and pasted the links properly. If I did, there’s no need to visit. But if the links don’t work, you must (must!) visit my blog.TWIC: lots of generators, a science of imagination, Gates on NPR I guess I might use some of the generators to start my creative juices flowing or to get me thinking about aspects I normally ignore (I am generally oblivious to fashion choices) but again, I mostly use them for secondary or less important characters. Personally, I would like to read more stories set in Central Asia - it is a huge area with varied terrain but it mostly feels like little more than an annoying place that must be crossed to get to the good stuff. I sometimes get Mayan, Aztecs and Incas mixed up and would love to read stories set in one of those cultures at its prime. Oh, and stay away from Georgian Bay in Ontario Canada because I have a story coming out next year set in that location and I don’t want to share it!

The news is filled with characters everyday. There are a lot of villains, sometimes there are real heroes. And don’t just look at today’s news. There are many you can tap from history. Sometimes I’ll create characters that are chimeras of different people/characters. A feature here, a trait there.
